related.meaning: Kaos kaki Jepang (dengan jari kaki terpisah)

lessons.japanese: 一人暮らしをしていると、お袋の味が恋しくなるよ。
lessons.indonesian: Living on my own, I really miss my mom's cooking.

lessons.japanese: お袋の前ではそのことに触れるな。
lessons.indonesian: Don't talk about it in my mother's presence.
